Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Southbound 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Roosevelt, State, Archer and Clark: due to street blockage near Clark/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my route?

 

Southbound #24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Roosevelt, State, Archer, Clark and over regular route, due to street blockage near Clark/Roosevelt.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Kimball and Belmont
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Belmont due to a mechanical problem at Montrose.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Belmont due to a mechanical problem at Montrose.

As a result, trains are operating only between Wellington and Clark/Lake at this time.

Shuttle buses are now available from Kimball to Belmont to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Westbound Reroute near at 69th/Red Line
ShortDescription: Westbound 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, King Drive, 71st, State and into the Terminal due to, street blockage near 69th/Red Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, King Drive, 71st, State and into the Terminal due to, street blockage near 69th/Red Line.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Northbound Reroute near 69th/Red Line
ShortDescription: Northbound 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 71st, State and into the Terminal due to, street blockage near 69th/Red Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 71st, State and into the Terminal due to, street blockage near 69th/Red Line.
